meanings.sent1: The contaminative water made the fish sick.
meanings.sent2: The factory's contaminative emissions harmed the environment.
meanings.sent3: The contaminative mud turned the white dog into a brown mess.
meanings.sent4: His contaminative behavior spread negativity like a virus.
meanings.sent5: The contaminative smell of rotten eggs filled the room.

meanings.sent1: The contaminative waste leaked into the river.
meanings.sent2: The contaminative chemicals seeped into the soil.
meanings.sent3: The contaminative spill created a rainbow sheen on the water.
meanings.sent4: Her contaminative habits spread throughout the office.
meanings.sent5: The contaminative fog obscured the view of the city skyline.
